content: >http://apartheidweek.org >http://westernstandard.blogs.com/shotgun/2009/03/jewish-student-beaten-during-cfs-forum-on-racism.html >http://westernstandard.blogs.com/shotgun/2009/03/statement-made-by-assaulted-jewish-student.html >http://www.theepochtimes.com/n2/content/view/13111/ The 5th Annual 'Israel Apartheit Week' is being held in more than 40 university centers around the world this week. Largely featuring speeches and study sessions on the Israel-Palestine situation, this year's events have been marked by reports of Jewish protestors being set upon by crowds of up to two hundred. The smaller crowds, of 20 or so attending most events, aren't reported to be violent.

Largely featuring speeches and study sessions on the Israel-Palestine situation, this year's events have been marked by reports of Jewish protestors being set upon by crowds of up to two hundred. The smaller crowds, of 20 or so attending most events, aren't reported to be violent.
title: Apartheit Week: Jews Beaten
